description: Change engine oil and oil filter (severe duty conditions).
Change engine oil and oil filter (normal conditions).
Rotate the tires.
Inspect and replace engine air cleaner filter (dusty or off-road conditions).
Inspect and replace brake linings.
Replace air conditioning filter (if equipped).
Inspect front and rear axle fluid.
Inspect the CV joints.
Inspect the exhaust system.
Inspect and replace front suspension, the rods ends and boot seals.
Replace engine air cleaner filter.
Inspect the transfer case fluid.
Change the front and rear axle fluid (only for police, taxi, fleet or frequent trailer towing).
Change the automatic transmission fluid and filter (only for police, taxi, fleet or frequent trailer towing).
Change the transfer case fluid (only for police, taxi, fleet or frequent trailer towing).
Inspect and replace PCV valve.
Flush and replace the engine coolant.
Replace spark plugs.
Replace timing belt.
Change the automatic transmission fluid and filter.
